p: ALT, AST, ALP and total bilirubin levels were all significantly increased in the cisplatin group when compared to the control group at p<0.05 (Table 3 (Tab. 3)). Conversely, a significant reduction was also observed for ALT, AST and ALP and total bilirubin in PmEO100CP and PmEO200CP groups compared to the cisplatin group at p<0.05. However, the result showed no significant difference between the PmEO400CP group and the cisplatin group. For all measured parameters, PmEO400CP group showed a significant increase compared to all treatment groups at p<0.05. The supplementation of 400 mg/kg of P. minus essential oil alone showed significant increase in ALP and total bilirubin compared to the control group at p<0.05. Meanwhile, BCP group showed significantly improved ALT, AST, ALP and total bilirubin compared to the cisplatin group at p<0.05.
